title: [LoL聯盟戰棋] Teamfight Tactics 集中討論區 (1)

replies.msg:
聯盟戰棋是英雄聯盟中的一種全新遊戲模式，讓你在一場大亂鬥中與七位敵人爭奪至高無上的地位。藉由建立你的終極隊伍，強化你的力量，來展開自動化的戰鬥。





最新消息：
更新（1/7）
強化


掉率變動



Cheat Sheet






歡迎一眾迷上lol 新mode teamfight tactics既朋友一齊吹水傾心得!!

新手攻略:

聯盟戰棋的玩法可說是自走棋一個模子搬過來的
那之所以叫自走棋 就是因為棋子會自己戰鬥
玩家只要負責買棋子 擺棋子 換裝備之類的準備工作就行
3隻相同的棋子可以升級成2星 3隻相同的2星可以升級成3星
再搭配其他棋子各有的種族職業之間的連動 建立一個強大的隊伍
與其他7名玩家互相廝殺 最後一名存活的就是勝利者

這遊戲是會有利息的機制
10塊錢每回合1點利息
以此類推最高到50塊錢

每贏一個對戰回合會有一蚊落袋

每過一段時間 玩家會圍圈圈 共享徵招
這個時間處於落後的玩家能夠先選棋子
反之越領先就越後選
雖說是選棋子啦 但其實這個時間主要是選裝備
賣掉英雄 他身上的裝備會重置到一旁

低階英雄會原價退錢

《英雄聯盟》全新模式「聯盟戰棋」在上週六(6月29日)正式於台服開放後，重新點燃召喚師回歸 峽谷 棋盤的熱情，不過經過這幾天的經驗，大家不難發現下棋除了考驗策略之外，也挺考驗「人品」，比方說刷新英雄，還有掉落道具的機率就常常令人崩潰。

有Reddit網友就在今天(7月4日)曝光聯盟戰棋在PBE測試服(9.14版本)的重大更新，其中一項是100%道具的掉落率！

道具掉落機制更新
一、打完第一波小兵後新增啾吉的遭遇，啾吉的攻速會隨時間增加

二、從啾吉開始的每一輪野怪遭遇戰都會保證掉落最少一件道具，這件道具會以神秘物品的形式掉落；另外擊殺飛龍更會掉落一件「完整」的套裝 (沒聽錯是完整套裝)

下個更新開始平衡 有裝同無裝差太遠

Now revives with 500 hp and +1 star

EDIT: Warmogs now regens 6% max health instead of 3%

EDIT 2: Frozen heart reduces attack speed by 25% up from 20%

EDIT 3: It's possible to get a 4 star unit if a 3 star unit has GA

EDIT 4: Zeke's gives 15% attack speed now instead of 10%

EDIT 5: Spatula items now give extra stats on top of the class change, so looks like instead of say 20 AD you'd get 40

EDIT 6: Rageblade gives 4% attack speed instead of 3%

EDIT 7: Zekes and Locket only apply to units in the same row as opposed to ALL adjacent units

EDIT 8: some clarification on zekes. Theres a new visual indicator that shows about 3? Spaces to the right and left of a unit with the item

EDIT 9: idk if this was always a thing but Elise's ability now mentions "Spiderlings will apply Elise's on-hit effects" so stuff like titanic could be really really silly on her

Balance changes

Elise is now a one-cost unit.
Demons now deal 100 percent / 200 percent / 300 percent of the amount of mana burned as damage.
Frozen Heart now slows attack speed by 25 percent (up from 20 percent).
Hextech Gunblade now heals from 33 percent damage done (up from 25 percent).
Red Buff and Morellonomicon now deal 13 percent of the target’s max HP over 5 seconds.
Runaan’s Hurricane now summons a spirit who mirrors your attacks, dealing 25 percent damage.
Guardian Angel now revives a unit with 500 HP and +1 rank (allowing for units to surpass three-star).
Warmog’s Armor regen increased from 3 percent to 6 percent max HP per second.
Zeke’s Herald attack speed increased from 10 percent to 15 percent.
Spatula items now double the stats of the item they merge with.
Guinsoo’s Rageblade attack speed per stack increased from 3 percent to 4 percent.
Zeke’s Herland and Locket of the Iron Solari now only apply to units in the same row instead of all surrounding units.


Source:https://dotesports.com/league-of-legends/news/teamfight-tactics-pbe-patch-9-14-full-notes/amp
